snippet.title: Horror Tales: The Beggar TEASER TRAILER - PS5, X|S, Steam, PS4, One
snippet.description:
The Beggar is waking up. Time to F💚💚K OFF.
Wishlist:https://store.steampowered.com/app/1343340/HORROR_TALES_The_Beggar/
PS5 Glow in the Dark Preorder: https://store.tesuragames.com/producto/horror-tales-the-beggar-ps5/

Terror and science fiction journey in a shattered world with physics-based boss-fights, combats and puzzles. Change the weather or even time itself to survive with the full power of Unreal Engine 5 and Nvidia DLSS. Sequel of Horror Tales: The Wine.
